markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" />envision, command;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You deposit up to 30 gp of gems and coins in a separate pouch of the _bottomless purse_ while thinking of a common consumable item costing that amount of money. You then upend the pouch. The item you envisioned comes tumbling out into your hand.
name: envision, command

text: Activate Two Actionsenvision, command; Frequency once per day; Effect You deposit up to 30 gp of gems and coins in a separate pouch of the bottomless purse while thinking of a common consumable item costing that amount of money. You then upend the pouch. The item you envisioned comes tumbling out into your hand.
